question: 高校
sourceMnemonic: The <kanji>tall</kanji> <kanji>school</kanji> is for when your kids get about as tall as they're going to get. That's <vocabulary>high school</vocabulary>, when most people stop growing taller.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
